news_header: Storms cause damage and power outages, affecting homes and businesses. Compensation varies based on individual insurance policies.
news_text: Storms and wintry weather can lead to significant damage to homes and businesses, with insurance coverage and compensation differing widely based on individual policies. Power outages during storms can make life uncomfortable, and compensation may be available from local electricity distributors, typically starting at £70. Employees affected by weather should communicate with employers about work arrangements. Rail and flight services may also be disrupted, with refunds available for cancellations. The Association of British Insurers advises on recovery steps for flood damage, emphasizing the importance of preparedness for future storms.
